typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> valCityTable
valCityTable lookup(left(CityName,1) == ' ',
	broadcast: 'none')~> takeWrongData
takeWrongData derive(CityName = ltrim(CityName,' ')) ~> NewCityName
